document_data.caption: The location of Thomm Warehouse (labeled 233) on a circa [[1357 DR]] map of [[Waterdeep]]
document_data.name: Thomm Warehouse
document_data.mainbody: The '''Thomm Warehouse''' was a storage warehouse in [[Waterdeep]] that was privately owned by [[Haerlit Thomm]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: This warehouse was located along [[Sambril Lane]],
document_data.Structure: This warehouse was four stories tall.
document_data.Services: Within his warehouse, Haerlit Thomm would fence furniture and distinctive furnishings that he had obtained from his contact [[Felzoun Thar]].
